name: Wage Slave TD: Prologue
description:
The difference between the prologue and the official version:
  • Wage slaves: 10 in the prologue, 15 in the official version
  • Boss: 10 in the prologue, 14 in the official version
  • Maps: 18 in the prologue, 45 in the official version
  • System: The official version adds challenge mode, endless mode, and random mode
  • Archive: Don’t worry, the official version will inherit the archive progress of the prologue

Arrange your wage slaves, pass wave after wave of boss reviews, win, and unlock more project maps!

Wage slaves showing their special abilities


  • 15 kinds of wage slaves, including hardworking pig, licking dog, old white rabbit, egg hen, pan sheep, mud horse, bloody rooster, and proud cow.
  • Rich movements, sounds, and Emoji
  • There is also an elephant

Endless changes and events


  • Various events
  • Workplace memes
  • Wage slaves can learn from others, and the combinations are endless

A boss group full of wisdom


  • 14 types of bosses including Bird Director, Wolf Director, Crocodile Manager, Lucky Horse, Airborne Bat, etc.
  • Pickup aritist, sexual harassment, crocodile tears, boss features are all there

Additional game mode


  • Private work from lonely boss
  • Challenge the best wage slave configuration and refresh personal best results

The game is developed by an individual and mainly draws inspiration from: Carrot Fantasy, Bloons, and Plants vs. Zombies.
